national_motto:
{{lang|ko|[[Hongik Ingan|"홍익인간" ("弘益人間")]]|italics|=|off}}
{{small|"Benefit broadly in the human world /
Devotion to the Welfare of Humanity"}}

{{lang|ko|"애국가" ("愛國歌")|italics|=|off}}
"[[Aegukga]]"
{{small|"Patriotic Song"}} {{lower|0.2em|[[File:National anthem of South Korea, performed by the United States Navy Band.wav|center]]}}
map_caption: Land controlled by South Korea shown in dark green; claimed but uncontrolled land shown in light green
ethnic_groups: Predominantly [[Koreans|Korean]]. No official statistics {{Efn|No official data regarding ethnicity is collected by the South Korean government.
